recipesJson.name: Honey Blu Blu
recipesJson.author: Moggle33
recipesJson.description: When i first starting vaping 5 years ago. I tried a honey blueberry flavor that i fell in love with, its the flavor that kept me from going back to cigs. I've been trying recreate it ever sense. The combo  of FLV Milk And Honey and FW blueberry is crazy good. Hope everybody enjoys!

reviews.text: Well made recipe, it‚Äôs delicious and tastes very realistic/no off notes whatsoever- delicious!!
I doff my cap to you sir. Very nice.

I really loved blue honey cream by strix elixir. They went or if business last year and I've been looking for something like it. This is close and in my opinion the blueberry is more authentic. Great mix!
My girlfriend and a few friends I mix for all say this is the best juices I've mixed. I'm inclined to agree. Excellent job!!
This is probably one if not the best blueberry cream recipes I've ever mixed up for me & my wife (she agrees üòÅ) nice job and keep up the good work! üëçüëç
